name: family_history
description: The collection of data elements related to the donor's family health history. To submit multiple conditions for a single donor' family, submit multiple rows in the family history file for this donor.

fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider
fields.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_family_condition_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the condition observed in the family, assigned by the data provider (within a study)

fields.name: family_condition_name
fields.description: Name of the condition observed in a family member

fields.name: family_condition_age
fields.description: Age when condition was observed in family member

fields.name: family_condition_relationship
fields.description: What is the relationship of the family member to the donor.

meta.notes: Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donor and family member http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode

fields.name: family_cancer_history
fields.description: Donor has a history of cancer in the family
